trans-unit.source:
\n

Suppresses reporting of a specific static analysis tool rule violation, allowing multiple suppressions on a single code artifact.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The identifier of the analysis tool rule the attribute applies to.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the category identifying the classification of the attribute.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the identifier of the static analysis tool rule to be suppressed.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xx xx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The identifier of the static analysis tool rule to be suppressed.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xx xx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the justification for suppressing the code analysis message.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets an optional argument expanding on exclusion criteria.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A string containing the expanded exclusion criteria.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the scope of the code that is relevant for the attribute.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The scope of the code that is relevant for the attribute.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets a fully qualified path that represents the target of the attribute.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx x xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A fully qualified path that represents the target of the attribute.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x
